name: natural-language-commander
description: A tool for connecting natural language commands with callbacks.

0.0.0.name: natural-language-commander
0.0.0.description: A tool for connecting natural language commands with callbacks.

scripts.build: tsc && browserify -o dist/nlc.js -e dist/NaturalLanguageCommander.js --standalone nlc && uglifyjs dist/nlc.js -o dist/nlc.min.js

0.0.1.name: natural-language-commander
0.0.1.description: A tool for connecting natural language commands with callbacks.

scripts.build: tsc && browserify -o dist/nlc.js -e dist/NaturalLanguageCommander.js --standalone nlc && uglifyjs dist/nlc.js -o dist/nlc.min.js

0.0.2.name: natural-language-commander
0.0.2.description: A tool for connecting natural language commands with callbacks.

scripts.build: tsc && browserify -o dist/nlc.js -e dist/NaturalLanguageCommander.js --standalone nlc && uglifyjs dist/nlc.js -o dist/nlc.min.js

0.0.3.name: natural-language-commander
0.0.3.description: A tool for connecting natural language commands with callbacks.

scripts.build: tsc && browserify -o dist/nlc.js -e dist/NaturalLanguageCommander.js --standalone nlc && uglifyjs dist/nlc.js -o dist/nlc.min.js

0.0.5.name: natural-language-commander
0.0.5.description: A tool for connecting natural language commands with callbacks.

scripts.build: typings install && tsc && browserify -o dist/nlc.js -e dist/NaturalLanguageCommander.js --standalone nlc && uglifyjs dist/nlc.js -o dist/nlc.min.js

0.0.6.name: natural-language-commander
0.0.6.description: A tool for connecting natural language commands with callbacks.

scripts.build: typings install && tsc && browserify ./dist/NaturalLanguageCommander.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-runtime ] ] -o dist/nlc.js --standalone NLC && uglifyjs dist/nlc.js -o dist/nlc.min.js

0.0.7.name: natural-language-commander
0.0.7.description: A tool for connecting natural language commands with callbacks.

scripts.build: tsc && browserify ./dist/NaturalLanguageCommander.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-runtime ] ] --standalone NLC | derequire > dist/nlc.js && uglifyjs dist/nlc.js -o dist/nlc.min.js
scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist && typings install
